description: Describes an Explainability resource created using the  CreateExplainability operation.

parameters.name: ExplainabilityArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Explaianability to describe.

nested_items.name: ExplainabilityArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Explainability.

nested_items.name: ExplainabilityName
nested_items.description: The name of the Explainability.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Predictor or Forecast used to create the Explainability resource.

nested_items.name: ExplainabilityConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration settings that define the granularity of time series and time points for the Explainability.

nested_items.name: TimeSeriesGranularity
nested_items.description: To create an Explainability for all time series in your datasets, use ALL. To create an Explainability for specific time series in your datasets, use SPECIFIC.

nested_items.name: TimePointGranularity
nested_items.description: To create an Explainability for all time points in your forecast horizon, use ALL. To create an Explainability for specific time points in your forecast horizon, use SPECIFIC.

nested_items.name: EnableVisualization
nested_items.description: Whether the visualization was enabled for the Explainability resource.

nested_items.name: DataSource
nested_items.description: The source of your data, an Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that allows Amazon Forecast to access the data and, optionally, an Key Management Service (KMS) key.

nested_items.name: Path
nested_items.description: The path to an Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket or file(s) in an Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that Amazon Forecast can assume to access the Amazon S3 bucket or files. If you provide a value for the KMSKeyArn key, the role must allow access to the key.

nested_items.name: KMSKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Key Management Service (KMS) key.

nested_items.name: Attributes
nested_items.description: An array of attributes specifying the name and type of each field in a dataset.

nested_items.name: AttributeName
nested_items.description: The name of the dataset field.

nested_items.name: AttributeType
nested_items.description: The data type of the field.

nested_items.name: StartDateTime
nested_items.description: If TimePointGranularity is set to SPECIFIC, the first time point in the Explainability.

nested_items.name: EndDateTime
nested_items.description: If TimePointGranularity is set to SPECIFIC, the last time point in the Explainability.

nested_items.name: EstimatedTimeRemainingInMinutes
nested_items.description: The estimated time remaining in minutes for the  CreateExplainability job to complete.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: If an error occurred, a message about the error.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the Explainability resource. States include:
ACTIVE.
CREATE_PENDING, CREATE_IN_PROGRESS, CREATE_FAILED.
CREATE_STOPPING, CREATE_STOPPED.
DELETE_PENDING, DELETE_IN_PROGRESS, DELETE_FAILED.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: When the Explainability resource was created.

nested_items.name: LastModificationTime
nested_items.description: The last time the resource was modified. The timestamp depends on the status of the job:
CREATE_PENDING - The CreationTime.
CREATE_IN_PROGRESS - The current timestamp.
CREATE_STOPPING - The current timestamp.
CREATE_STOPPED - When the job stopped.
ACTIVE or CREATE_FAILED - When the job finished or failed.
